template.name: template_tribalfoodreq

textComponent.name: Text
textComponent.event: if((manager:isIdle() == true) and (element("cost"):GetInt() ~= game.tribalLevelRequirements("food"))) then element("cost"):SetInt(game.tribalLevelRequirements("food")) component("text"):SetString("-"..game.commaizeNumber(element("cost"):GetInt())) component("size"):SetFloat(0.3) component("autoScale"):SetInt(1) end

template.event: local text = element["Text"] text:setColor(text("red"):GetFloat() * 2.0, text("green"):GetFloat() * 2.0, text("blue"):GetFloat() * 2.0)
local text = element["Text"] text:setColor(text("red"):GetFloat() * 0.5, text("green"):GetFloat() * 0.5, text("blue"):GetFloat() * 0.5)
